existing_features.title: Create a service listing page that displays available makeup services with names, descriptions, durations, and prices
Implement a booking form where users can select a service, choose a date and time slot, and provide contact information (name, email, phone)
Create an admin view that displays all bookings with customer details, service information, and appointment times
Design a welcoming homepage with hero section showcasing makeup services and a clear call-to-action to book an appointment

Apply a sophisticated, beauty-industry appropriate design theme with elegant typography, soft color palette, and luxurious aesthetic that creates a professional and trustworthy atmosphere for a makeup booking service
Update all instances of 'Glam Studio' to 'Naaz Studio' in the homepage hero section, header navigation, and any other visible branding throughout the application
Create a team member profile section on the homepage featuring Naziya, a female makeup artist specializing in bridal makeup, party makeup, and all types of makeup services
Add a comprehensive beauty services section listing all available services: facial, waxing, body massage, body polishing, haircut, manicure, pedicure, and hair spa
Display the uploaded portfolio photos as background images or decorative elements throughout the beauty services section and team profile to showcase Naziya's makeup work

Create a portfolio gallery section on the homepage displaying the 11 uploaded bridal and traditional makeup portfolio images (IMG-20260222-WA0010.jpg through IMG-20260222-WA0001.jpg) in a responsive grid layout with hover effects
Update the team member profile section for Naziya to include a portfolio showcase featuring the uploaded bridal makeup images as visual examples of her work
Enhance the beauty services section by adding the uploaded portfolio images as background elements or decorative visual examples for relevant service categories
Add location/address information to the body massage service in the services listing, displaying where the massage service is provided

Add contact phone numbers 9392570180 and 9550935579 to the footer section of the Layout component, displaying them as clickable telephone links with appropriate formatting and styling consistent with the rose gold aesthetic

Add a contact information section to the homepage featuring the phone numbers 9392570180 and 9550935579 with a heading like 'Contact Us' or 'Book Your Appointment', styled consistently with the beauty industry aesthetic
Add a prominent 24/7 availability badge or notice to the homepage hero section indicating that Naaz Studio services are available around the clock
Add 24/7 availability information to the contact section on the homepage, displayed near the phone numbers to inform users that booking and inquiries are available at any time
Add a 24/7 availability indicator to the header navigation in the Layout component to consistently communicate round-the-clock service availability across all pages
Add a service area section to the homepage that displays 'Serving Hyderabad, Secunderabad, and outskirts' with appropriate styling consistent with the beauty industry aesthetic
Update the footer section in the Layout component to include service area information 'Serving Hyderabad, Secunderabad, and outskirts' near the contact phone numbers
Add service area 'Hyderabad, Secunderabad, and outskirts' to the contact section on the homepage alongside the phone numbers and 24/7 availability information

new_feature_requests.summary: Create website for booking makeup appointments
Store booking appointments in the backend with service details, customer information, appointment date and time, and booking status
Implement time slot availability logic to prevent double-booking and show only available times for selected dates
Replace 'Glam Studio' branding with 'Naaz Studio' throughout the website
Add team member profile section featuring Naziya specializing in bridal makeup, party makeup, and all types of makeup services
Add comprehensive services section listing all beauty services: facial, waxing, body massage, body polishing, haircut, manicure, pedicure, hair spa with relevant background photos
Add location information to the massage service section
Add contact phone numbers 9392570180 and 9550935579 to the website
Add 24/7 availability information to the website
Add service area information (Hyderabad, Secunderabad, and outskirts) to the website
